function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate recovery efficiency of coronavirus in wastewater samples","Impact":"Misleading data on virus presence in sewage, potential underestimation of virus load","Mitigation":"Develop controls to consistently monitor and improve recovery efficiency, use additional quantification methods","Technologies":"qRT-PCR, concentration and purification techniques","People":"Research scientists, wastewater treatment facilities","Owner":"Research scientists, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Use of non-enveloped F+ RNA phages for estimating coronavirus recovery efficiency","Impact":"Overestimation of virus recovery efficiency, inaccurate data on virus presence","Mitigation":"Develop and use controls specific to enveloped viruses, implement additional quantification methods","Technologies":"Enveloped virus controls, qRT-PCR, concentration and purification techniques","People":"Research scientists, wastewater treatment facilities","Owner":"Research scientists, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Unreliable quantification of SARS-CoV-2 in sewage due to qRT-PCR assay limitations","Impact":"Inability to accurately surveil COVID-19 through sewage, potential misinterpretation of virus load","Mitigation":"Further development of qRT-PCR assays, establishment of reliable quantification methods","Technologies":"qRT-PCR, quantification methods","People":"Public health authorities, research scientists","Owner":"Public health authorities, research scientists"}]}
